name: Qualifications.getCorpQualPercentage
description: Returns Corporate Volume Numbers based of day and over a specified number of periods

inputs.notes: Period Type, Only PB is currently supported.
Bonus Period in CCYYMM format.  Defaults to current if nothing is passed in.
Day of the period.  (1-7 for weekly, 1-31 for monthly)
Number of periods used to Calculate the Corp Average.  Default is 6.

outputs.notes: Average Period volume across specified periods
Percent of total volume specified day makes up
